member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactory.CreateError
member.param: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactory.CreateInstance
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the Media Engine.
member.param: A bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

param.name: pAttr
param.para: A pointer to the interface of an attribute store.

This parameter specifies configuration attributes for the Media Engine. Call to create the attribute store. Then, set one or more attributes from the list of Media Engine Attributes. For details, see Remarks.

member.param: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: A required attribute was missing from pAttr, or an invalid combination of attributes was used.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactory.CreateTimeRange
member.param: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactory
member.summary: Creates an instance of the Media Engine.
